name: Mitigation Playbook for Masquerading Incident
description: This playbook is designed to respond to an incident where an attacker used masquerading to disguise a malicious executable as a legitimate process.

action--312fb737-aafa-4b21-a90e-d6c3f73b.name: Delete disguised svchost.exe
action--312fb737-aafa-4b21-a90e-d6c3f73b.description: Inspect Server-1 and delete the disguised svchost.exe file in C:\Windows\System32\.

action--54b1c459-f698-434d-963b-c3b0edc5.name: Establish file integrity monitoring
action--54b1c459-f698-434d-963b-c3b0edc5.description: Establish file integrity monitoring on Server-1.

action--d5fbf486-f7d9-4944-a0be-4444b549.name: Update process execution policies
action--d5fbf486-f7d9-4944-a0be-4444b549.description: Review and update process execution policies on Server-1.

action--bfe9bd0f-b238-4f01-bafa-6a0f3812.name: Revoke access on Workstation-12
action--bfe9bd0f-b238-4f01-bafa-6a0f3812.description: Revoke access to Workstation-12 databases for processes originating from Server-1.

commands.command: sqlcmd -S Workstation-12 -Q "REVOKE CONNECT ON DATABASE::Workstation12DB FROM [Server-1$];"

action--7e8a70cd-c05b-41f0-b175-828214b6.name: Check logs for unauthorized access
action--7e8a70cd-c05b-41f0-b175-828214b6.description: Check Server-1's and Workstation-12's logs for unauthorized access patterns.

commands.command: Invoke-Command -ComputerName Server-1,Workstation-12 -ScriptBlock { Get-EventLog -LogName Security -EntryType FailureAudit } && Set-ADDefaultDomainPasswordPolicy -LockoutThreshold 5 -LockoutDuration 00:30:00

parallel--bd58df6e-bc14-4030-8b76-ca2b23.name: Execute Mitigations
parallel--bd58df6e-bc14-4030-8b76-ca2b23.description: Run mitigation steps for the masquerading incident in parallel.
